amendment.description: To prohibit allocations of Special Drawing Rights at the International Monetary Fund for perpetrators of genocide and state sponsors of terrorism without congressional authorization.

action.text: Amendment SA 1034 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 205.

Amendment SA 1034 proposed by Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3721-3722) To prohibit allocations of Special Drawing Rights at the International Monetary Fund for perpetrators of genocide and state sponsors of terrorism without congressional authorization.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1034 proposed by Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 935.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1034 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 205.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1034 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 205.
